issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.13.2 (build 4287, CL 1.11.114)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome://newtab

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, I don't care about cookies

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

```
youtube.com#%#//scriptlet('json-prune', 'auxiliaryUi.messageRenderers.enforcementMessageViewModel')

```

issue.body:

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

uBlock Origin v1.50.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

https://www.globaltools.dk/ https://www.globaltools.no/ https://www.globaltools.se/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.globaltools.dk/
https://www.globaltools.no/
https://www.globaltools.se/
```

### Issue:
Missing objects.

### Example:
`https://www.globaltools.no/verktoy/ror-og-vvs-vaerktoj-8817/inspektions-og-lokalisering-8857/`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Tracking Protection filter**

### Problem rule:
`||cdn.clerk.io/clerk.js
`
### Possible fix:
`@@||cdn.clerk.io/clerk.js^$domain=globaltools.dk|globaltools.no|globaltools.se`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v115.0.2-2 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.50.0
